name: Medium 长文
description: Medium 平台风格，适合长文阅读

styles.container: max-width: 680px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px 12px 48px 12px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 21px; line-height: 1.58 !important; color: #242424 !important; background-color: #fff !important; word-wrap: break-word; letter-spacing: -0.003em;

h1.base: font-size: 42px; font-weight: 700; color: #242424 !important; line-height: 1.15 !important; margin: 56px 0 24px; letter-spacing: -0.022em; font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif;

h2.base: font-size: 34px; font-weight: 700; color: #242424 !important; line-height: 1.2 !important; margin: 48px 0 20px; letter-spacing: -0.019em; font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif;

h3.base: font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; color: #242424 !important; line-height: 1.25 !important; margin: 40px 0 16px; letter-spacing: -0.014em; font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif;

base.base: font-size: 24px; font-weight: 700; color: #242424 !important; line-height: 1.3 !important; margin: 32px 0 12px; font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif;

list.taskList: margin: 16px 0; line-height: 1.58 !important; color: #242424 !important; font-size: 21px; list-style: none;

code.block: margin: 40px 0; padding: 24px; background-color: #f7f7f7 !important; border-radius: 8px; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 1.5 !important;
code.inline: font-family: Menlo, Monaco, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 18px; padding: 3px 6px; background-color: #f5f5f5 !important; color: #d73a49 !important; border-radius: 3px;

styles.quote: margin: 32px 0; padding: 0 24px; border-left: 3px solid #242424; color: #242424 !important; font-size: 20px; line-height: 1.5 !important; font-style: italic; font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 600px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 40px auto;

table.header: background-color: #f7f7f7 !important; padding: 14px 18px; text-align: left; border-bottom: 2px solid #e6e6e6; font-weight: 700; color: #242424 !important;

styles.hr: margin: 56px auto; border: none; text-align: center; height: 1px; background-color: #e6e6e6 !important; max-width: 400px;

footnote.ref: color: #242424 !important; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.8em; border-bottom: 1px solid #242424;
footnote.backref: color: #242424 !important; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.8em; border-bottom: 1px solid #242424;
